description:
Last Friday, we updated a season 11 barefoot match with Serena Blair and Luna Light. We know the outcome of that match, now see how it happened.
Luna Light came to U/S with absolutely NO wrestling experience. At 4'9 she is the smallest girl on our mats since Shannon Kelly was a player. She's spunky, tenacious and a small package of dyn-O-mite. See a casual behind the scenes as Serena and Ariel coach Luna before and during the match. This is a glimpse of how we get our girls ready for their first match. The girls really let their personalities shine when they aren't trying to kill each other on the mats
title: Behind the Scenes with Serena and Luna
